title: About Me
text:
About Me
Iâ€™m Leo Hung Nguyen, a graduate student in Applied Business Analytics at Boston University with a passion for data, problem-solving, and strategic decision-making.
My focus is on applying machine learning, analytics engineering, and business intelligence to help organizations make smarter, data-driven decisions.


Professional Background
I bring cross-functional experience across:

Data analytics

Digital marketing

Financial modeling

International project development

Previously, I supported analytics at Marriott Bonvoy, directed marketing strategy at Tin A Co., Ltd, and coordinated EV infrastructure and investor relations at Thang Uy Group.
